item.title: Premiere comp√©tition Kaggle
item.description: Les consignes : 1- Build a Random Forest model with all of your data (X and y). 2- Read in the “test” data, which doesn’t include values for the target. Predict home values in the test data with your Random Forest model. 3- Submit those predictions to the competition and see your score. 4- Optionally, come back to see if you can improve your model by adding features or changing your model.
